name: Cool Cucumber Melon
description:
Cool Cucumber Melon body scrub is the newest scent on the Body Scrubs by Rebeca line.

This scrub is a sugar based scrub mixed with seed oil for the ultimate moisturizing and exfoliating experience. 

The cucumber melon fragrance is refreshing and mild, it will remind you of a cool spring day.

6.76 oz

name: Sweet Honey Almond
description:
Sweet Honey Almond is a very sweet scented brown sugar scrub made with essential oils that aids in the gentle exfoliation of dead skin cells. Olive oil deeply penetrates and moisturizes dry skin making providing a beautiful glow.

This scrub is mixed to perfection. When you put it on you'll feel baby smooth.

name: Vanilla Lavender
description:
Vanilla Lavender is a sugar-based scrub that contains essential oils that nourish and exfoliate the skin. 

Vanilla lavender contains almond oil as it's main moisturizing agent.  

Almond oil is an excellent emollient and moisturizer.  As an emollient it nourishes and softens the skin helping to keep it smooth to the touch. It also aids in the dryness of skin. 

The scent of lavender is calming and relaxing. It is recommended that this scrub is used at bedtime to enjoy the relaxing effects.

**Allergy Alert**
(Not recommended for those with nut allergies) 

A replacement oil is available.

6.76 oz

name: Fresh Mint Eucalyptus *NEW RECIPE* Limited Time Only
description:
A new take on a favorite - Fresh Mint Eucalyptus is cooling and refreshingly delightful!  

Fresh Mint Eucalyptus is a combination of sugar and sea salt. The sugar-sea salt combination works to give your skin a moderate scrub. Peppermint oil provides a fresh, sharp, minty menthol aroma. Peppermint oil also helps reduce irritation on the skin and helps with acne.  

Eucalyptus has a clear, sharp, fresh and very distinctive smell. It also has multiple benefits for the skin.
6.76 oz.

name: Lemon Burst
description:
Lemon scrub exfoliates and cleanses the skin. Lemon peel and exfoliating sugar helps to polish and remove dead skin cells while the olive oil and seed oil moisturize. 

Lemon body scrub is a super body scrub that will heal, exfoliate, brighten, and moisturize your skin leaving you with a healthy radiant glow. 

6.76 oz

name: Crystal's Brown Sugar
description:
Crystals Brown Sugar scrub is named after my dear friend Crystal who shared her recipe with me. 

Crystal's brown sugar scrub gently exfoliates while the olive oils provide an in depth moisturizing experience as olive oil is a denser oil that will keep you moisturized all day. This scrub will leave your skin undeniably smooth.

The scent of the natural brown sugar is wonderfully sweet and spicey. And of course it makes your skin glisten as any Crystal would.

6.76 oz

name: Morning Joe
description:
Morning Joe is refreshing and revitalizing! The aroma of freshly ground coffee beans not only awakes the senses but this super scrub reduces the appearance of cellulite and aids in tightening the skin. 

Finely ground coffee beans act as the skin tightening agent while the seed oil moisturizes and smooths skin.

6.76 oz
